Sentencas: The performance of RuOx-ZrO2 (8 mol%Y2O3) Composite SOFC electrodes for electrochemical oxidation of methane was evaluated.
Titulo: Methane oxidation on composite ruthenium electrodes in YSZ cells

Sentencas: The main products detected in the temperature range 773-923 K were CO and H-2, with selectivity over 80% and 90%, respectively, i.e., partial oxidation of methane was the dominant electrochemical process.
Titulo: Methane oxidation on composite ruthenium electrodes in YSZ cells

Sentencas: Oscillatory behavior with variation of P-CH4 and current imposition was also observed.
Titulo: Methane oxidation on composite ruthenium electrodes in YSZ cells

Sentencas: Post-run temperature programmed oxidation (TPO) experiments showed the absence of carbon deposition.
Titulo: Methane oxidation on composite ruthenium electrodes in YSZ cells

Sentencas: Current vs. potential measurements revealed that composite RuOx-ZrO2 (8 mol%Y2O3) anodes prepared using combustion synthesis behave as non-polarizable electrodes.
Titulo: Methane oxidation on composite ruthenium electrodes in YSZ cells
